text: Jack Joseph Valenti (September 5, 1921 â€“ April 26, 2007) was an American business person. He was president of the Motion Picture Association of America from 1966 to 2004. During that time, he created the MPAA movie rating system. Valenti died in Beverly Hills, California from a stroke, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1921 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Businesspeople from Houston
title: Jack Valenti
